info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 7 at 11:41AM EDT until May 7 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland OH
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio...
Scioto River Near Larue affecting Marion County.
For the Scioto River...including Larue, Prospect...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Scioto River near Larue.
* WHEN...Until late this evening.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding occurs in lowland areas south of the Village of La Rue. Roads inundated include High Street, Larue Prospect Road, and parts of Vine Street.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/cle.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING
